description:
The Perfect Lightroom Workflow was designed for one reason and one reason only: To make your life easier. Through my time being a photographer and working in the consumer electronic business I noticed something. No one really understands how to organize digital media. I also found that I was no good at it either. As I dove into the wonderful world of photography I though I would see this problem disappear. I would say to myself, "These are professionals. They must handle their files efficiently." That mindset ended quickly as I found that most creatives have no mind for workflow. But they desperately wanted to learn it. So I set out to find the best workflow I could. This training course is it. It is all my research on how to work efficiently and effectively all rolled into one. It is The Perfect Lightroom Workflow.

We work on a 6 STEP process:

  1. Import
  2. Select and Organize
  3. Normalize
  4. Creative Edit
  5. Export and Convert
  6. Archive
In this course we will take you through all these steps and how make them work with your studio. 

This is not a course in all the in's and out's of Lightroom. This coure is for those photographers that want to have a clean and efficient workflow that will save them time and headaches.
title: The Perfect Lightroom Workflow
